DOC.brief_summary: Coffee worldwide drink , part culture . There concern effect coffee health . Recently , epidemiological study show benefit coffee drinking diabetic also prevent diabetes population . We aim understand effect coffee caffeine vascular system , special coronary artery disease patient , diabetic end normal people .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Coffee Health Heart Normal , Diabetics e Coronary Artery Disease Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Patients wash-out period ( 21 day ) coffee caffeine-drinks . Then submit treadmill test , MAPA , Holter-ECG vascular reactivity study , biochemical inflammatory plasma dosage , basal . Then start period coffee drink 4 week ; exams repeat . We study two type coffee , arabica robusta ; two type toast bean ( regular soft ) . Also regular decaffeinate coffee . A total 300 ( 100 normal people , 100 diabetic , 100 coronary disease ) individual test .
DOC.criteria: Normal Volunteers : 1 . Healthy volunteer . 2 . Age 20 80 year . 3 . No addict drug . 4 . Absence chronicle disease . 5 . No alcohol abuse . 6 . No smoker . Coronary artery disease : 1 . Presence coronary artery disease , coronary angiography 2 . Stable angina , class 13 CCS . 3 . Age 20 80 year . 4 . Treadmill effort test ischemia . 5 . No alcohol abuse . 6 . No smoker . Diabetes : 1 . Presence type II Diabetes oral treatment . 2 . Age 20 80 year . 3 . Absence chronicle disease , except diabetes . 4 . No alcohol abuse . 5 . No smoker . Normal Volunteers : 1 . Any blood test twice upper limit range . 2 . Presence enlarge QRS . Coronary artery disease : 1 . Any blood test twice upper limit range even treatment . 2 . Presence enlarge QRS . 3 . Ventricular dysfunction ( EF < 45 % ) . Diabetes : 1 . Blood glucose great 160 mg/dL . 2 . Others blood test twice upper limit range even treatment . 3 . Presence enlarge QRS .
